import React from 'react' import CompanyLogo from '../icons/company-logo' import useButtonAction from '../../hooks/useButtonAction' import './index.css' const Nav = () => { const { handleStartHiring, handleNavigation } = useButtonAction(); return (
handleNavigation('how-it-works')} > How it works handleNavigation('pricing')} > Pricing handleNavigation('roles')} > Roles handleNavigation('our-promise')} > Our promise
) } export default Nav;
